addAchievementsDescription: List your achievements and responsibilities in this position in a clear and tangible manner
landingHeaderNote: No need to learn to present yourself. Your network will do it for you.
landingHeaderVideoDescription: See How you get 3X more interviews in one minute!
landingStepsOneDescription: Sign up with LinkedIn & enter your achievements
landingStepsThreeDescription: Send your recommendation requests and that’s it!
landingReasonsSubtitle: No more resume rejection emails because of 6 simple reasons
landingReasonFirstSectionDescription: Make your resume stand out from the crowd
landingReasonSecondSectionDescription: Being recommended by your network has never been easier
landingReasonFirstCardDescription: All your recommendations are detailed, yet easily scannable.
landingReasonSecondCardDescription: Reference check have never been easier. And companies love it when candidates make their job easy for them.
landingReasonThirdCardDescription: Getting different insights and recommendations ups your game by a lot.
landingReasonFourthCardDescription: Give your network a break once in a while. They’ll tap their screen a bunch of times and do whatever.
landingReasonFifthCardDescription: Your network doesn’t even need to be creative for the recommendation. Not that tapping your screen isn’t hard.
landingReasonSixthCardDescription: As interesting as you are, your skills and achievements are the only things that referrers rate.
landingSampleDescription: If you think LinkedIn has the best recommendation feature, think again! If you're still not sure about switching over to Recomlinked, Take a look at the comparison chart.
landingSampleTableSecondRowTitle: Easier reference check by directly contacting referrers
landingSampleTableFourthRowTitle: Downloading resume PDF & attaching it to your resume
landingSampleTableFifthRowTitle: Organized, reliable data, all in one place
landingSampleDownloadDescription_1: If you’re like me you’re already bored by the table and the stats. Let’s take a look at the PDF sample. Is it impressive or what?
landingSampleDownloadDescription_2: You could not appear more trustworthy if you tried. Does a company think your resume is fabricated? They can tap the Recomlinked logo for file verification. Do your recommendations look shady and fake? Click on the referrer’s profile and see their LinkedIn profile for yourself.
landingFooterTitle: We got your resume’s recommendations from A to Z
landingReportInsightTitle: What does the Recomlinked report include?
landingRecruitmentTitle_1: The job market faces a significant problem: information validity and reliability.
landingRecruitmentTitle_2: Recomlinked effectively helps organizations solve it.
recommendationFormDescriptionHint: Your participation will be a significant help for [name] to unlock a world of career possibilities!
recommendationFormDescriptionEasySection: No need for extensive writing—just a few clicks!
recommendationFormDescriptionNote: Note: Once three recommenders complete their requests, the applicant can see the final results.
termOfServiceDescription_1: By using our website the terms below will automatically apply to you. Users must carefully read the sections below before using this website. Users are not allowed to extract and/or use this website’s source code.
termOfServiceDescription_2: We are committed to ensuring this website’s efficiency and usefulness. For this reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the website or to change its services at any time and for any reason. We will never charge users for using this website or its services without clarifying what they are paying for.
termOfServiceDescription_3: At some point, we may wish to update the website’s services. We do not promise the website’s update’s relevancy to you. Neither do we promise its functionality with the OS/Browser version installed on your device. Additionally, by accepting our Terms of Service you will be accepting all our future updates as well. We may also wish to stop providing the website and/or its services and may terminate use of it at any time without giving a prior notice of termination. Unless we tell users otherwise, upon any termination, the rights and licenses granted to you in these terms will end automatically.
termOfServiceJobSeekerCostDescription: Recomlinked has three plans for job-seekers. The costs of service, according to the plans shown before purchase, are 4, 9, and 19 US dollars as explained in the purchasing process.
termOfServiceReferrerCostDescription: Recomlinked is currently free to use for all referrers.
termOfServiceDocumentDescription: We may periodically update our Terms and Conditions. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by updating the Terms and Conditions on this page. These terms and conditions are effective as of 2023-01-01.
termOfServiceContactingDescription: You can visit the following page to contact us about all your privacy concerns.
supportLinkedin: Also, you can contact us on
privacyDocumentDescription: Throughout this document, we will explain how we process and store your data. The content in this document applies only to ‘Recomlinked’ and any other services we might build in the future.
privacyInternalDescription: We do not store any user data unless necessary for providing a better user experience. We provide full transparency about which data we collect or store. We use the latest technology to ensure data safety.
privacyCollectingDescription: Two types of data are collected on this website. Service-specific data which we use to provide different services to our users. This data is limited to the data users decide to share with us. We also obtain analytics and statistical data which are collected when processing users’ actions.
privacyDocumentChangingDescription: This document is one of our business’ key documents and it will change over time. To find the latest version of our privacy policy, visit this webpage. All major changes to our privacy policies will be sent in the form of an email to our users.
privacyDataConnectionDescription: To gain access to or delete your data on our website, feel free to contact us.
aboutUsDescription_1: At Recomlinked, our mission is to help job-seekers find and get the jobs they deserve. We too have looked for jobs in the past and have heard the infamous “we’ll call you” over and over again. We don’t live in a utopia and we’re not always going to find the perfect job. But at Recomlinked we try our very best to help every one of you, fellow job-seekers, land any job that matches your skillset.
aboutUsDescription_2: Recomlinked helps all of its users have more professional resumes with reliable recommendations from their former managers or colleagues. We help job-seekers worldwide find and land their dream job with only a couple of clicks.
recommenderDialogGuidDescription: At this step, you are currently completing this section of your report.
experienceDialogGuidDescription: At this step, you are currently completing this section of your report.
recommendationDialogGuidDescription: Send the automated links to your recommenders and see their status change here accordingly. After your recommenders take action, you can check the status here.
recommendationsDescription: Simply copy or send the automated links to your recommenders, and witness their status change reflected here. Once your recommenders have taken action, you can conveniently track their progress and check their current status in this section.
recommendationsDownloadDescription: To download your report, at least 3 of your recommenders should have completed their requests
recommendationsShareDescription: Send the automated links to your recommenders
recommendationsSharedItemDescription: Please help [name] to unlock a world of career possibilities!
recommendationsUnlockSection: Click here to unlock more recommendations!
recommenderAddingDescription: Add your colleagues and managers to recommend you! Make sure to include a minimum of 5 recommenders from your professional circle.
achievementAddingDescription: List your responsibilities and accomplishments in your professional experiences, and receive valuable endorsements from your network. This allows you to present a robust and credible representation of your skills and abilities.
testimonialDescription_1: “Recomlinked is a perfect platform for experienced job hunters. It helped me a lot. I used to ask for referral before this and now people ask me for referral all because of RecomLinked. It helped me get in touch with right recruiters.”
testimonialDescription_2: “Great addition to my resume. The change in how many companies want to interview me couldn’t be clearer. and you don't need traditional types of recommendation letters.”
testimonialDescription_3: “Th  e thing I like most about this is that I don’t even need to do the whole “previous employer’s contact info” thing. It takes care of the contact info for me. Quite frankly this might just be the most to-the-point resume-related service I’ve used.”
necessaryCookiesDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by visitors which amount to a request for services, such as setting privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but this may cause parts of the site to not work properly. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
policyNecessaryCookiesDescription: Necessary cookies allow us to offer you the best possible experience when accessing and navigating through our Website and using its features. For example, these cookies let us recognize that you have created an account and have logged into that account to access the content.
policyFunctionalityCookiesDescription: Functionality cookies let us operate the Website and Services in accordance with the choices you make. For example, we will recognize your username and remember how you customized the Website and Services during future visits.
performanceCookiesDescription: These cookies (supplied by Google Analytics and Clarity) allow the Recomlinked to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. If these cookies are disabled, we will not know when a user like yourself has visited our site or be able to monitor the site’s performance.
cookiePolicyDescription: This cookie policy describes what cookies are and how and they're being used by the recomlinked.com website and any of its related products and services. This Policy is a legally binding agreement between you and us. If you are entering into this agreement on behalf of a business or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity to this agreement, in which case the terms "User", "you" or "your" shall refer to such entity. If you do not have such authority, or if you do not agree with the terms of this agreement, you must not accept this agreement and may not access and use the Website and Services. You should read this Policy so you can understand the types of cookies we use, the information we collect using cookies and how that information is used. It also describes the choices available to you regarding accepting or declining the use of cookies. For further information on how we use, store and keep your personal data secure, see our privacy policy.
cookieFooter: The Recomlinked uses cookies to give users like yourself the best possible content and experience.
whatAreCookiesDescription: Cookies are small pieces of data stored in text files that are saved on your computer or other devices when websites are loaded in a browser. They are widely used to remember you and your preferences, either for a single visit (through a "session cookie") or for multiple repeat visits (using a "persistent cookie").
sessionCookiesDescription: Session cookies are temporary cookies that are used during the course of your visit to the Website, and they expire when you close the web browser.
persistentCookiesDescription: Persistent cookies are used to remember your preferences within our Website and remain on your desktop or mobile device even after you close your browser or restart your computer. They ensure a consistent and efficient experience for you while visiting the Website and Services.
firstAndThirdPartyCookies: Cookies may be set by the Website ("first-party cookies"), or by third parties, such as those who serve content or provide advertising or analytics services on the Website ("third party cookies"). These third parties can recognize you when you visit our website and also when you visit certain other websites.
whatTypeOfCookies: What type of cookies do we use?
whatAreCookieOptionsDescription_1: If you don't like the idea of cookies or certain types of cookies, you can change your browser's settings to delete cookies that have already been set and to not accept new cookies. Visit internetcookies.com to learn more about how to do this.
whatAreCookieOptionsDescription_2: Please note, however, that if you delete cookies or do not accept them, you might not be able to use all of the features the Website and Services offer.
changesAndAmendmentsDescription_1:
We reserve the right to modify this Policy or its terms related to the
        Website and Services at any time at our discretion. When we do, we will
        revise the updated date at the bottom of this page, post a notification
        on the main page of the Website. We may also provide notice to you in
        other ways at our discretion, such as through the contact information
        you have provided.
changesAndAmendmentsDescription_2:
An updated version of this Policy will be effective immediately upon the
        posting of the revised Policy unless otherwise specified. Your continued
        use of the Website and Services after the effective date of the revised
        Policy (or such other act specified at that time) will constitute your
        consent to those changes.
acceptanceOfPolicyDescription:
You acknowledge that you have read this Policy and agree to all its terms
        and conditions. By accessing and using the Website and Services you agree
        to be bound by this Policy. If you do not agree to abide by the terms of
        this Policy, you are not authorized to access or use the Website and
        Services. This cookie policy was created with the help of
        <a href="https://www.websitepolicies.com" target="_blank" rel="nofollow" class="text-secondary" >WebsitePolicies</a
        >.
contactingUsDescription:
If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints regarding this Policy
        or the use of cookies, we encourage you to contact us using the details
        below:
cookiePolicyCreatedTime: This document was last updated on March 30, 2023
encourageDescriptionToBuyPlan: Unlock more recommendations and take your professional credibility to the next level!
encourageDescriptionToBuyOrganizationPla: Choose a plan that works best for you and your team
recommenderVoucherText: We extend our gratitude for your participation as recommender.
receivingActivationCodeDescription: If you have received an activation code from the organization or human resources department, enter the code in this section to upgrade your plan:
whoIsRecommenderQuestion: Who is the person recommending you?
recommenderFormRelationQuestion: How do you know your recommender?
enterJobTitleText: Enter your job title at the time
recommendationDownloadDescription: The PDF download button is disabled until at least 3 recommenders have responded to your request.
canNotAddExperienceMessage: To add an experience you should have at least one recommender in previous step.
chooseCompanyPlaceholder: Choose from the companies you added in the previous step
achievementsSuggestionDescription: Request relevant samples to help you better show your achievements. Be sure to review and customize the received examples to align with your specific job experience.
DownloadPdfHint: At least 3 recommenders have responded to your request.
planIsExpiredHint: You have reached the limit of your free plan. To add more recommenders and enhance your report, upgrade your plan.
defaultEmailText:
Hello,

I hope you're doing great!

I recently discovered Recomlinked, an excellent tool for showcasing my professional achievements with endorsements from colleagues, which really enhances my resume.

I'd like to ask a favor. Could you take a few minutes for a brief questionnaire about our work experience together? It's quite simple – just choose from a list of options for 2 questions. No lengthy writing is needed!

Your input is very important to me and will significantly aid my professional progress.

Best regards,

[userName]
secondDefaultEmailText:
Hello,

I hope you're doing great!

I'd like to ask a favor. Would you mind taking a few minutes to respond to just 2 questions about our work experience together?
No need for writing—simply choose your answers!

Your input is very important to me and will significantly aid my professional progress.

Best regards,
[user]
recommenderHasNoEmail: You didn't enter recommender email. Please enter recommender email in Add Recommender step
organizationLandingSlug: Cut your hiring risks by 46%: ensure every resume is genuine and verified
organizationLandingHeaderNote: 85% of employers have uncovered a misrepresentation in a candidate’s resume. With RecomLinked, you don’t need to validate resumes by yourself. Your applicant's network will do it for you.
organizationLandingStepsOneDescription: Sign up with your company’s Linkedin account
organizationLandingStepsTwoDescription: Request a report from applicants on RecomLinked
organizationLandingStepsThreeDescription: You’ll be notified once the report is ready
organizationLandingTitle: Accelerate your recruitment process with Recomlinked
organizationLandingTitleSubtitle: Start using RecomLinked and only interview candidates with authentic and verifiable resumes.
RecomlinkedTechnologiesCopyRight: 2024 Recomlinked Technologies Inc. All Rights Reserved
organizationReasonSubtitle: Only interview candidates with authentic and verifiable resumes.
demoRequestDesc: To book a demo, please click the button below and select a time that suits your schedule.
invitationDescription: Thank you for your continued engagement in our selection process. To gain a deeper understanding of your skills, we're eager to ask just 2 simple questions to your managers and colleagues.
invitationCreating_2: 2- Add a minimum of 5 current or past colleagues and managers.
invitationCreating_3: 2- Ensure that they respond to the questions we'll email to them.
invitationThanksMessage: Thank you for your ongoing participation in our selection process.
organizationDownloadPdfHint: Candidate did not accept invitation or less than 3 recommenders have answered.
downloadablePdfHint: At least 3 recommenders have responded to your request. You can share your request with them in social media in Recommenders' Status step
